PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-13172018-10-26,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Crown Corporation General Regulations, 1995
PrecisRegulations Amending the CROWN CORPORATION GENERAL REGULATIONS, 1995 in order to (1) ensure that the threshold for seeking the Minister of Finance’s approval on the specific terms and conditions of capital lease transactions continues to allow for oversight of Crown corporations’ significant lease liabilities; and, (2) reduce the anticipated administrative burden for Crown corporations and the Government by changing the threshold that determines when the Minister of Finance’s approval must be sought.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0220 Publication Date: 2018-11-14
AttachmentsAttachment
